lead_paragraph: The St. Louis Blues have signed the free-agent forward Martin Rucinsky, who had 16 goals and 55 points for the Rangers last season. Rucinsky, 35, also played for the Blues in 2002-3, collecting 16 goals and 30 points in 61 games.
